title: Getting Back to LoL After Being Away for Over 3+ Years
body: Im trying to figure out how come I AM Technically a level 30, but when logging in the game, it shows im a level 2? I know Ive been gone for over 3-5 years, well since season 3 really but, help me out here?

replies.body: Welcome back!!  It can take a bit for your account to sync up to the boards since it's been so long.  If it hasn't already, it should show the correct level in no time.  I also refreshed your account to help with that!
